cause.description:
Dear friends,
since we all know and love Adri, we should contribute to her 18th birhday present: a digital camera.
1. Adri's cameralessness must end immediatly.
2. Every Adri is entitled to her own digital camera, poor or not, even if it is not her who buys it by herself, or with the help of friends.
cause.name: Adri needs a digital camera
